Package marathon.leela

Interface Summary
EnemyManagerListener This interface is for objects that need to listen for enemy updates
 

Class Summary
Constants A dummy class that simply contains constants used by various components of Durandal
EnemyManager This class manages and tracks enemy movements, notifying listeners as needed
EnemyPoint This class represents an enemy point.
EnemyRobot This class stores data about enemy robots
ForcePoint The ForcePoint class is used in Durandal's movement algorithms.
ForceVector A simple vector "struct"
Leela Main robot class.
MovementManager This class is responsible for managing Durandal's movement
SwivelPoint The SwivelPoint is a point that keeps Durandal oriented properly
Utilities Dummy class for holding common utility methods
Wall The Wall class is a subclass of ForcePoint.
Wave This abstract class defines the basic behavior for waves
WaveManager This class manages wave movements
